solution_line_template: When Jennifer is {jennifer_future_age} years old in ten years, her sister Jordana will be {jordana_multiplier}*{jennifer_future_age}={jordana_future_age} years old.
She's currently {years_until_future} years younger, so she's {jordana_future_age} - {years_until_future} = {jordana_current_age} years old
